scripts.postinstall: cd webapp && ng cache clean && cd ..
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean-build-dir && npm run npm-ci-modules && npm run build-ddocs && npm run css-enketo && npm run build-webapp-dev && npm run build-admin && npm run build-config && npm run copy-static-files-to-api
scripts.build-dev-watch: npm run build-dev && cd webapp && npm run build -- --configuration=development --watch=true & node ./scripts/build/watch.js
scripts.build-documentation: npm run jsdoc-admin && npm run jsdoc-sentinel && npm run jsdoc-api && npm run jsdoc-shared-libs
scripts.build-webapp-dev: cd webapp && npm run build -- --configuration=development && npm run compile
scripts.dev-api: npm run copy-api-bowser && TZ=UTC nodemon --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 --ignore 'api/build/static' --ignore 'api/build/public' --watch api --watch 'shared-libs/**/src/**' api/server.js -- --allow-cors
scripts.e2e-integration-local: export VERSION=$(node ./scripts/build/get-version.js) && npm run build-service-images && npm run ci-e2e-integration
scripts.integration-api: cd api && npm ci && cd .. && mocha 'api/tests/integration/**/*.js' -t 10000
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit && npm run integration-api
scripts.unit: npm run npm-ci-modules && npm run unit-webapp && npm run unit-admin && npm run unit-shared-lib && npm run unit-api && npm run unit-sentinel
scripts.unit-webapp: UNIT_TEST_ENV=1 mocha 'webapp/tests/mocha/**/*.spec.js' && cd webapp && npm run unit -- --watch=false
scripts.build: npm run clean-build-dir && npm run build-ddocs && npm run css-enketo && npm run build-webapp && npm run build-admin && npm run uglify-admin && npm run cleancss-admin && npm run build-config && npm run create-staging-doc && npm run populate-staging-doc
scripts.build-webapp: cd webapp && npm run build -- --configuration=production && npm run compile
scripts.ci-compile: npm run check-version && npm run npm-ci-modules && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run integration-api && npm run unit
scripts.publish-for-testing: npm run build-service-images && npm run publish-service-images && npm run compile-ddocs-staging && npm run push-ddoc-to-staging
scripts.test-config-default: cd config/default && npm ci && npm run test
scripts.test-config-standard: cd config/standard && npm ci && npm run ci
scripts.browserify-admin: mkdir -p api/build/static/admin/js/ && browserify --debug -t browserify-ngannotate -r './admin/node_modules/angular-translate/dist/angular-translate-interpolation-messageformat/angular-translate-interpolation-messageformat:angular-translate-interpolation-messageformat' -r './admin/node_modules/google-libphonenumber:google-libphonenumber' -r './admin/node_modules/gsm:gsm' -r './admin/node_modules/object-path:object-path' -r './admin/node_modules/bikram-sambat:bikram-sambat' -r './admin/node_modules/lodash/core:lodash/core' admin/src/js/main.js > api/build/static/admin/js/main.js
scripts.build-admin: npm run compile-admin-templates && npm run browserify-admin && npm run css-admin
scripts.build-config: node ./node_modules/medic-conf/src/bin/medic-conf.js --skip-dependency-check --archive --source=config/default --destination=api/build/default-docs upload-app-settings upload-app-forms upload-collect-forms upload-contact-forms upload-resources upload-custom-translations
scripts.build-ddocs: npm run copy-ddocs && npm run set-ddocs-version && npm run set-build-info && npm run compile-ddocs-primary && npm run copy-api-ddocs
scripts.build-service-images: npm run copy-static-files-to-api && npm run uglify-api && npm run cleancss-api && node scripts/build/cli buildServiceImages && npm run build-images
scripts.cleancss-admin: cleancss api/build/static/admin/css/main.css > out.css && mv out.css api/build/static/admin/css/main.css
scripts.cleancss-api: cleancss api/build/static/login/style.css > out.css && mv out.css api/build/static/login/style.css
scripts.copy-static-files-to-api: npm run copy-api-bowser && npm run copy-api-resources && npm run copy-webapp-static && npm run copy-admin-static
scripts.default-wdio-mobile-local: export VERSION=$(node ./scripts/build/get-version.js) && npm run build-service-images && wdio run ./tests/e2e/default-mobile/wdio.conf.js --suite=all
scripts.local-images: export VERSION=$(node ./scripts/build/get-version.js) && npm run build-service-images && npm run create-local-docker-compose-files
scripts.standard-wdio-local: export VERSION=$(node ./scripts/build/get-version.js) && npm run build-service-images && wdio run ./tests/e2e/standard/wdio.conf.js --suite=all
scripts.uglify-admin: uglifyjs api/build/static/admin/js/main.js -o api/build/static/admin/js/main.js && uglifyjs api/build/static/admin/js/templates.js -o api/build/static/admin/js/templates.js
scripts.uglify-api: uglifyjs api/build/static/login/script.js -o api/build/static/login/script.js && uglifyjs api/build/static/login/lib-bowser.js -o api/build/static/login/lib-bowser.js
scripts.wdio-local: export VERSION=$(node ./scripts/build/get-version.js) && npm run build-service-images && wdio run ./tests/e2e/default/wdio.conf.js
